attributes.action: knight Prof. Sid Watkins for services to motorsport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Professor Eric Sidney Watkins (OBE) has served motorsport with distinction for several decades. The improvements to safety within the sport have been dramatic over the years, and many are attributable to this Liverpudlian neurosurgeon. Medical Cars and helicopters at F1 races were upon his insistance, and he has saved the lives of many drivers, including the later double World Champ, Mika Hakkinen at the 1995 Australian GP. Time to give Prof Sid the knighthood he deserves?

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
